title: Marvellous Creatures, a Children's Poems Bundle
description: Do you ever wonder what it's like to ride a dragon?Or what fairies get up to? And are fruit and vegetables really as good for you as your parents tell you? You will find the answer to these questions and more in this wonderful collection of children's poems. Each tells an uplifting story of kindness, encouragement, creativity and self-confidence. The delightful illustrations complement each tale perfectly and will appeal to the imagination of every reader, of any age. You will fall in love with each of these whimsical poems and its characters. They are Marvellous Creatures indeed....
author: Mark Kerger
